structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Federal Gifts, Loans Or Grants In Aid For Improved Transportation Management Systems
law.text: The secretary shall apply for, accept and expend, subject to appropriation, on behalf of the commonwealth, any gift, loan or grant-in-aid from the federal government, or any agency or instrumentality thereof for demonstration projects and programs as may become available to the commonwealth for the purpose of energy conservation for improved transportation management systems or for improved transportation management systems.
